author: Daniel Greene
description:
What are your favorite authors actually reading?

In this special video, I asked a bunch of authors across fantasy, sci-fi, and horror to share their favorite reads of the year — the books that blew them away, inspired them, or kept them up way too late. If you're looking for authentic, author-approved book recommendations, this is your next TBR goldmine.

Let me know in the comments: which recommendation are you adding to your shelf next?

🧠 Want to read the books they recommended? I’ve linked as many as I could in the description below.

📚 My Books:
Neon Ghosts: https://shop.wraithmarked.com/collections/standard-editions-1/products/neon-ghosts-a-witchs-sin-hardcover
Breach of Peace: https://tinyurl.com/BoPTLT
Rebels Creed: https://tinyurl.com/RCTLTDG

title: Best Books of the Year… According to Fantasy Authors
